attributes.action: Ban any works vehicle parking in residential streets when not in use.
attributes.background: Large works vehicles, road works and builders vans, take up resident parking spaces, making it difficult for residents to park in their own streets. They sometimes block pavements, driveways or even make using a road dangerous by blocking the view of traffic to pedestrians and other road users.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because local parking restrictions are the responsibility of your local council and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you.

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
